name: SearchContext

fields.name: searchPhrase
fields.description: The user-entered search string as a case-sensitive single phrase, with all non-alphanumeric characters removed.

constructors.name: SearchContext
constructors.signature: public SearchContext(List<DataSource.Table> metadata, Integer offset, Integer maxResults, List<DataSource.TableSelection> tableSelections, String searchPhrase)
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the SearchContext class with the specified parameter values.

params.name: searchPhrase
params.description: List of table metadata that describes the external system’s tables to query. Specifies the starting row offset into the query’s result set. Specifies the maximum number of rows to return in each batch. List of queries and their details. The details represent the FROM, ORDER BY, SELECT, and WHERE clauses in each SOQL or SOSL query. The user-entered search string as a case-sensitive single phrase, with all non-alphanumeric characters removed.

constructors.name: SearchContext
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the SearchContext class.

description: An instance of SearchContext is provided to the search method on your DataSource.Connection class. The instance corresponds to a search or SOSL request.
